original_text: And when Paul had laid his hands on them, the Holy Spirit came on them, and they began speaking in tongues and prophesying.
korean_text: 바울이 그들에게 안수하매 성령이 그들에게 임하시므로 방언도 하고 예언도 하니

sentences.original_text: And when Paul had laid his hands on them
the Holy Spirit came on them
and they began speaking in tongues and prophesying
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 방언으로 말하고 예언하기 시작했다
